emailTemplates.name: Payment Reminder
emailTemplates.subject: Payment Reminder: {{amount}} due on {{dueDate}}
emailTemplates.body:
Dear {{customerName}},

This is a reminder that your payment of {{amount}} is due on {{dueDate]].

Please make the payment at your earliest convenience.

Thank you for your prompt attention to this matter.

emailTemplates.name: Overdue Payment Notification
emailTemplates.subject: Overdue Payment Notification: {{amount}} due on {{dueDate}}
emailTemplates.body:
Dear {{customerName}},

This is a notification that your payment of {{amount}} is overdue. The payment was due on {{dueDate]].

Please make the payment at your earliest convenience to avoid any further action.

emailTemplates.name: Payment Confirmation
emailTemplates.subject: Payment Confirmation: {{amount}} received on {{paymentDate}}
emailTemplates.body:
Dear {{customerName}},

This is a confirmation that we have received your payment of {{amount}} on {{paymentDate]].

Thank you for your prompt payment.
